New Records: Domantas Sabonis is the first player with 20 points and 25 rebounds in a game at the Celtics since Kareem Abdul-Jabbar in 1971
Key Match Events: Sacramento took command with a 24-9 run in the fourth quarter, taking a 100-85 lead with 6:03 to play
Post-Match Reflections: Boston has lost two of its past three games
Miscellaneous Highlights: The victory extended Sacramento's season-high win streak to six games
It was Sabonis' 33rd double-double of the season and 24th game of his career with 20 or more rebounds
Others: The score was tied at 76 after three quarters
